attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having suffered in the incompetent hands of the Child Support Agency, mentally, emotionally and financially, a work colleague taking his life due to the pressure put on him by the CSA, I feel it is time that somebody did something about the lack of compassion and one sided views of the agency in question. I move to "scrap" the CSA in its entirity

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
